newsitem.title: JAPAN: Suspect said arrested in Japan in gruesome murder.
newsitem.headline: Suspect said arrested in Japan in gruesome murder.

text.p: Japanese police have arrested a suspect in the brutal murder last month of a schoolboy that shocked the nation, domestic media reported on Saturday.
The NHK television network and Kyodo news agency said the suspect was arrested in the city of Kobe in western Japan where the beheading of the 11-year-old boy took place on May 27.
The reports said that the person under arrest was a teenager but gave no further information.
Police in Kobe refused to confirm the reports but said a news conference would be held later on Saturday.
The arrest comes soon after police sources said that the month-long investigation had yielded few clues on why the boy was beheaded with a note criticising Japan's educational system.
His head was found at the front gate of a junior high school, while his body was dumped near a television station.
